26
THE STATUTORY PORTION AND DISPOSABLE PORTION OF AN ESTATE
(1) Forced heirs have a right to a share of an estate that the decedent cannot freely dispose of; this share shall be the statutory portion.
(2) The statutory portion of a decedent's descendants, adoptive children, and their descendants, and of the spouse shall be a half, and the statutory portion of the other heirs a third of the portion of the estate each of them would be entitled to in accordance with the law of succession.
(3) The rest of the estate may be freely disposed of by the testator; this share of the estate is the disposable portion.
